resources.string: data:text/html,<html><body onLoad=\"document.getElementById(\'form\').submit()\"><form id=\"form\" target=\"_self\" method=\"POST\" action=\"https://quickaccess.verizonwireless.com/bbportal/oem/start.do\"><input id=\"mdn\" name=\"MDN\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"%3$s\"><input id=\"oem\" name=\"oem\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"NEXT\"><input id=\"iccid\" name=\"iccid\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"%1$s\"><input id=\"imei\" name=\"imei\" type=\"hidden\" value=\"%2$s\"><input type=\"submit\"></form></body><html>
